data.name: Trump VS Covid: Ultimate Cheats Pack
data.detailed_description:
It's time to defeat coronavirus once and for all! Donald Trump himself asks your help for this fight. He has a great plan to use nuclear weapon and all USA resources to destroy that nasty virus. Satirical humor and perfectly balanced clicker gameplay will make you spend a lot of time with fun and pleasure.

ULTIMATE CHEATS PACK

Saving the world is quite a task! Let's make it a bit easier with this cheats pack.


This pack includes:
  • Passive income from x2 to x1000
  • Click income from x2 to x1000
  • Nukes damage from x2 to x1000
  • Inflation grows from x2 to x1000 slower

data.short_description: Save the world from COVID with nukes! ...and some cheats

fullgame.name: Trump VS Covid: Save The World Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 32-bit
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel High Definition Audio
